title: The World's Largest Cave Chamber Rises 1,000 Feet
teaser: Newly measured, the world's largest chamber is as tall as the Eiffel Tower. NPR's Ari Shapiro talks to long-time caver, Andy Eavis, who has explored the ethereally beautiful underground cave.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
